column4: Help!i need to fix a system that is/was running ubuntu feisty.I can only access the bios,can I possibly fix it and update somehow using a live disc w/o a fresh install?

feisty is EOL - so you might want to just consider fresh installing a more up-to-date release, but it might be possible to use a Feisty LiveCD and chroot into your system if you know what's wrong - or to backup files
maybe...  certainly you could use a modern LiveCD to backup your data - the chroot might be an issue (maybe not)
updating isn't possible - it's End of Life meaning not supported, no updates
